timeline.message: HBASE-24967 The table.jsp cost long time to load if the table include closed regions

timeline.author: Apache9
Apache9

replies.bodyText: Then better not import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetRegionInfoResponse.CompactionState directly? Import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetRegionInfoResponse, and then use GetRegionInfoResponse.CompactionState to reference the protobuf message.
replies.author: Apache9

timeline.author: Apache9

timeline.bodyText: I think this test is for testing the HBaseAdmin.getCompactionState so we should not change to use master?
timeline.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText: Make sense, will fix later, thanks.
